resources.string: Save 1 video that looks like the preview
Ratio eighteen point five by nine, %1$s megapixels, resolution %2$d by %3$d
Ratio one by one, %1$s megapixels, resolution %2$d by %3$d
Take pictures with the exposure and colour settings automatically set for you.
Preview all your lenses, record with the front and rear cameras at the same time, and create movies like a pro.
Record smooth time-lapse videos to speed up things like sunsets, traffic, and more.
Record artistic videos with adjustable depths of focus.
Take stunning portraits by adjusting the background of your shots.
Pack more into each shot by making vertical or horizontal panoramas.
Take control of your videos. Set the exposure, shutter speed, colour tone, and ISO sensitivity manually.
Take control of your pictures. Set the exposure, shutter speed, colour tone, and ISO sensitivity manually.
Take artistic selfies that focus on your face.
Shoot scenes once to capture all the meaningful moments in a series of pics and short clips.
Record videos at a high frame rate, which can be played in slow motion.
Slow down the action to soak in every moment.
Record videos with the exposure and colour settings automatically set for you.
Capture more with a wider lens
"Night hyperlapse: On Good for recording cars streaking by at night."
Keep the Shutter button within reach
Photograph your world, top to bottom
Use wide angle for group selfies
Data will be transferred in the background when the device is connected to a mobile network or WLAN.
Data will be transferred in the background when the device is connected to a WLAN.
This application requires the latest version of Google Play Services for AR.
This feature requires the latest version of Google Play Services for AR.
Installing Google Play Services for AR…
Unable to find application to perform this action.
To keep close-up subjects in focus and make them stand out, some of the background may be blurred.
To open %s, enable the app in Settings.
The following permissions are optional. You can use the app without them, but some functions may be limited.
A new version of %s is available.
Records sound through both your phone and Bluetooth mic.
Records sound through your Bluetooth mic or headset.
Best for capturing sound coming toward the front of the phone.
Captures sound equally from all directions.
Best for capturing sound coming toward the back of the phone.
Records sound through your USB mic or headset.
Records sound through your wired mic or headset.
Unable to record. Resolution not supported by memory card.
Burst shots not supported in low light conditions.
Optimize the contrast and colour of each scene by recording rear-camera videos in HDR10+. A supported device or service like YouTube is needed to play HDR10+ videos correctly.
"You can use Gallery to convert HDR10+ videos to standard dynamic range to share them on sites that don't support HDR10+."
Record videos in HEVC format to save space. You may not be able to play HEVC videos on other devices or share them online.
Match the mic zoom to the camera zoom while recording videos.
You cannot use more than one application that uses camera at the same time. Camera will close.
"Can't create GIFs in %d MP High resolution."
"Can't create a GIF while an effect is applied."
"Can't create a GIF while the timer is set."
Unplug the HDMI cable to record in %s resolution.
Select a lower resolution to record videos while using Smart View.
Unable to open Camera during video calls.
"Can't take burst shots in %d MP High resolution."
"Can't take burst shots while an effect is applied."
"Can't take burst shots while the timer is set."
"Can't take GIFs because your internal storage is full. You can still take regular pictures."
"Can't save file to SD card. Default storage location changed to internal storage."
Get the widest possible view of each scene by using the Ultra wide lens button. You can also use the lens buttons for fine control of the zoom.
Change storage location to SD card?
Clear some space in %s, then try again.
Get on-screen guides to help you line up great shots.
Image too long for a custom filter. Select another one.
The selected image is too small to use for a custom filter. Select another one.
Tap these thumbnails to switch back to the rear camera.
Pause and resume recording or take pictures without interrupting your videos.
When the rear camera detects a document, show a button to scan it without distortion.
Started dragging the item at position %d.
Item at position %d cannot be dragged.
Live focus was not applied due to shooting conditions.
Stay within 3 - 5 feet of the subject.
Lens blocked or not enough light.
"Can't use flash while OTG is connected."
Turn on Auto HDR to even out the lighting in this picture.
Make sure no one blinked in the last shot.
That last shot may be blurry.
The last shot might be blurred.
That shot might have come out a little blurry.

"A clean lens makes for better shots.
Clean your camera lens to keep taking great pictures."
Add an extra Shutter button you can move anywhere on the screen.
"Some things, such as burst shots and GIFs, can't be used while your phone's internal storage is full."
You can change how loud the camera shutter is using the system volume while outside of Korea and Japan.
Show your palm to the camera to take a selfie.
Capture more details in the bright and dark areas of your shots.
"In Photo mode, save space by capturing pictures in high efficiency image format (HEIF). Some apps and sites don't support this format."
Tap More to get to specialized camera modes.
Tap More to get to specialized camera modes, Bixby Vision, and AR Emoji.
Tap More to get to specialized camera modes, Bixby Vision, and the AR Zone.
Save space by capturing RAW pictures in high efficiency format.
Tap the heart rate sensor or hold up your palm where the camera can see it to automatically take a selfie.
Tap the heart rate sensor to take a selfie.
Unable to take selfies by tapping the heart rate sensor while using a flip cover.
Start Camera in the last used mode, such as Video, instead of always starting in Photo mode.
"Keep the filters you've applied to each mode instead of removing them when you close Camera."
Keep the angle you last used for the front camera instead of always switching back to normal angle.
"Your camera won't automatically switch to wide angle for group selfies while this is on."
"Add an extra Shutter button you can move anywhere on the screen so you can reach it with either hand. Hide it when you don't need it."
For best results, stay within 1.5 - 5 feet of the subject.
Location tags add geographical location data to your pictures and videos so you can search for and sort them based on where they were taken.
To add location tags to your shots, turn on Improve location accuracy.
Add tags to your pictures and videos so you can see where they were taken.
"Location turned off. To use location tags, turn on Location in the quick settings panel."
To add location tags to pictures and videos, Improve location accuracy needs to be turned on.
Wait for your phone to finish taking the picture.
Database storage space is nearly full.
Cannot use flash in low temperature.
Edit and perfect your shot in Adobe Lightroom.
Update your system software to use %s.
Be careful when sharing pictures and videos that include location data because other people can see where they were taken.
Your pictures and videos will contain information about where they were taken, so be careful when sharing them.
Touch and hold to move modes.
Add modes to the bottom of the screen.
Turn on Motion photo to record a short clip of what happens before each picture.
Shutter speeds below 0.3 capture multi frame pictures.
"Tap these thumbnails for close-ups that stay locked on people's faces."
Tap these thumbnails to switch between camera lenses.
No pictures or videos taken for your Gallery yet.
No pictures or videos were taken since the phone was last locked.
Not enough space in internal storage for burst shot.
"Can't zoom in or out in this mode."
Press the Pen button or hold up your palm to automatically take a selfie.
Hold up your palm where the camera can see it to automatically take a selfie.
Used to add location information to pictures
"You can still use the app's basic functions without allowing the optional permissions."
Used to block video recording during calls
Used to load images from Gallery
Used to show this app in a window while using other apps
See something tall? Pan the camera up or down to take a vertical panorama.
Save JPEG and RAW copies of pictures taken in Pro mode.
Pictures and videos will now be saved to internal storage.
Pictures and videos will now be saved to your SD card.
Save selfies as they appear in the preview without flipping them.
Battery too low to use flash.
"There aren't any apps on your phone that can use the info in this QR code."
Tap here to add “%1$s” to your calendar on %2$s at %3$s.
Tap here to add “%1$s” to your calendar on %2$s.
Tap here to add “%1$s (%2$s)” to your contacts.
Tap here to add “%s” to your contacts.
Tap here to write an email to “%s.”
Tap here to open the link in Facebook.
Tap here to add this plan to your watch or phone.
Tap here to open the link in Instagram.
Tap here to see the location on a map.
Tap here to write a message to “%s.”
Tap here to see the text in Notes.
Tap here to see the app in the Play Store.
Tap here to link your tablet to your phone.
Tap here to add this friend to Samsung Health.
Tap here to add this plan to your phone.
Tap here to pay with Samsung Pay.
Tap here to go to “%s” in your browser.
Tap here to connect to the “%s” network.
Point your camera at QR codes to add contacts, go to webpages, add calendar events, and more.
Scan QR codes with your camera
Switch to full screen view to scan QR codes.
You just used Quick launch to open the Camera.
Quickly press the Power key twice to open the camera.
Open Camera by quickly pressing the Home key twice.
RAW and JPG copies of each picture will be saved in internal storage.
"Can't save raw copies while adjusted colour tone is applied."
Recording will be stopped and saved when you answer call.
The video codec is currently being used by other applications. Close any other active video applications in Task Manager and try again.
Recording audio through both phone and Bluetooth mic.
Unable to open %s. Tap SETTINGS, go to App info > Permissions, then allow the following permissions and try again:
Unable to use Location tags. Unlock your device, open Camera, then allow the relevant permissions and try again.
To use Camera, unlock your phone and go to Settings > Apps > Camera > Permissions, then allow the required permissions.
All Camera settings will be reset to their default settings. %1$s will be turned off to turn on %2$s.
Unable to use %s. Tap SETTINGS, go to App info > Permissions, then allow the following permissions and try again:
The following will still be saved in internal storage:
Save space in internal storage by storing your pictures and videos on your SD card.
Just point your camera at QR codes to add contacts, go to webpages, add calendar events, and more. You can also open the QR scanner in the quick panel.
Automatically optimize your shots for the scene.
Tap OK to unlock your device and contact us.
To use %s, you need to unlock your phone.
Choose a colour tone for your selfies.
Pressing the Power key quickly 3 times sends SOS messages. Be careful when pressing the Power key twice to quick launch the camera.
Swipe up or down with two fingers to scroll.
Show your palm to the camera to take a selfie or start recording with the front camera.
Shutter speeds at or above 0.3 capture single frame pictures.
Automatically switch to wide-angle when there are two or more people in the selfie.
Swipe the Shutter button to the edge of the screen to take a burst shot or GIF.
Tap here, then back up a bit for better focus.
Tap here to make custom filters from your own pictures.
You can press the Side key twice to open the camera.
Press and hold or swipe here for fine control of the zoom.
Press the Power key twice to launch the camera.
Add a warm or cool tint to your selfies.
Drag and hold to zoom in or out at a constant speed.
Automatically add starburst flares to the light sources in dark scenes captured with the rear camera.
Switch to %d MP High resolution to capture every last detail in this scene.
Hold up your palm to take a selfie without touching your phone.
To enhance TalkBack in Camera, Voice control will be enabled.
Tap the screen to take selfies.
Temperature is too high to use %1$s. Wait for the phone to cool down before using %2$s.
Unable to turn on the flash. Try again when your device has cooled down.
"Body effects turned off. Body and Beauty effects can't be used at the same time."
"Beauty effects turned off. Beauty and Body effects can't be used at the same time."
"Can't zoom in or out while Body effects are on."
"Can't apply effects when shooting in %d MP High resolution."
"Can't apply effects while Super steady is on."
"Speed: Auto Good for recording sped-up videos of any scene."
"Speed: Night 15x Good for recording sped-up videos at night."
"Speed: Night 45x Good for recording cars streaking by at night."
"Speed: 10x Good for recording traffic going by."
"Speed: 15x Good for recording clouds moving across the sky."
"Speed: 16x Good for recording clouds moving across the sky."
"Speed: 30x Good for recording crowds of people walking by."
"Speed: 32x Good for recording crowds of people walking by."
"Speed: 4x Good for recording people being active."
"Speed: 5x Good for recording people running around and being active."
"Speed: 60x Good for recording sunrises and sunsets."
"Speed: 64x Good for recording sunrises and sunsets."
Will capture %s seconds of super slow-mo.
Keep the camera focused on the selected subject even if they move.
To use %1$s, %2$s needs to be turned off.
"Can't use %s. Delete some files or uninstall apps, then try again."
Automatically correct distortion in pictures taken with the ultra wide lens.
Also save an ultra wide-angle copy of each Live focus picture.
"Couldn't check for updates because your network connection wasn't stable."
"Can't record video. Not enough space in the attachment."
Maximum file size (%s) reached. Video saved. Recording will continue in new file.
Recording in %s. Video will be saved in internal storage.
Preview pictures and videos using the full screen.
Voice commands make it easier to control the camera while using Voice Assistant.
Focused on face to the left
Focused on face to the right
The latest version is already installed.
This appears when the mic zoom is set to match the camera zoom.
Tap the preview to stabilize the image.
Use Volume keys or tap shortcut button to adjust zoom.
